# JsonBoxClient constructor

Initializes a new instance of the [`JsonBoxClient`](../JsonBoxClient.md) class using a *httpClient*.

```csharp
public JsonBoxClient(HttpClient httpClient, string boxId)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| httpClient | The HttpClient to use for the web calls. |
| boxId | The id of the box to use. |
